means: 难以忍受的，令人不能容忍的

sentence.Network_en: He was insufferable at times — self-centred and narcissistic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有时让人难以容忍——自我中心，自我陶醉。
他很讨厌，真令人受不了。

sentence.Network_en: His insufferable insolence cost him many friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那令人难以容忍的蛮横态度使他失掉了许多朋友.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 张红岩TOEFL ... insubordinate adj. 不服从得 insufferable adj. 难以忍受的 insular adj. 海岛的，狭隘的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... imponderable （重要性）无法衡量的 insufferable 无法忍受的 vulnerable 易受攻击的，脆弱的.
The Iron... ... 7. nip at: 刺痛，挑剔，慢慢侵袭 8. insufferable: 令人无法忍受的 9. go to hell: 完蛋， 见鬼去（骂人用法）.

list.abs: He really is insufferable !, 他真可恶!

RelatedPhrase.word: And One Plaster Wang prescribes for an insufferable wi

list.key: And One Plaster Wang prescribes for an insufferable wi
list.abs: 王道士胡诌妒妇方 And One Plaster Wang prescribes for an insufferable wi fe The Taoist Priest Wang Prescribes a Cure for a Shrew -- ※ 来源:·BBS.
【摘要】 不可一世(insufferably arrogant)(Viva Live) 魔鬼的主意(Devil's desire)(Viva Live) 活着VIVA(Living Viva)(Viva Live).
You were insufferable ., 你是无法容忍的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps via French (now dialect) insouffrable, based on Latin sufferre 'endure' (see suffer)

entry.tran: 不能容忍的;难以忍受的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is insufferable, you are emphasizing that they are very unpleasant or annoying.

example.tran: 他很讨厌，真令人受不了。

means.word_mean: 1. used of persons or their behavior;

auth_sentence.content: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.
auth_sentence.res_content: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That man is the most insufferable little twerp.

auth_sentence.content: BILLINGS, Mont. The emissions are unhealthy, the noise insufferable.
auth_sentence.res_content: BILLINGS, Mont. The emissions are unhealthy, the noise insufferable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BILLINGS, Mont. The emissions are unhealthy, the noise insufferable.

auth_sentence.content: Rose, for her part, could be an insufferable didact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rose, for her part, could be an insufferable didact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rose, for her part, could be an insufferable didact.

means.word_mean: 难以忍受的;令人不能容忍的

sentences.en: Do we really have to invite all my insufferable relatives to the wedding?
sentences.cn: 我们真得请我那些叫人难以忍受的亲戚们来参加婚礼吗?
